paragraph.heading: 1Adding New Project Items
paragraph.paragraph:
A set of predefined project items have been defined for Eiffel Systems. To add a new item to a project that is currently open, right click on the project icon in the
0 !DefaultAssociativeIndex Eiffel Solution Explorer>Solution Explorer and from the context menu, select Add, Add New Item as follows:
A new item may also be added through the project menu:
The Add New Item dialog will then be displayed:

Select the type of item that you wish to add to your project, and click Open. A new item of the type selected will be added to your project. There are four types of new items available:
new_class.xml New Class
dialog.xml Vision2 Dialog
titled_window.xml Vision2 Titled Window
web_service.xml Web Service
